TopicTitle: The Unofficial Kerbal Space Program Forum Steam Group

Articles.Content:
Let's bump this up.

Folks, if you want realtime help with KSP or just want to chat about it and spacey stuff, or anything actually, join this Steam group. It's fun. We've got candy.
Be warned though, the chat can go off on some pretty wild and crazy tangents at times!!!

TripleHelix935 at the ready and battling Steam addiction right now...

and no i don't have KSP on steam since i am attached to 64-bit

TripleHelix935 at the ready and battling Steam addiction right now...

and no i don't have KSP on steam since i am attached to 64-bit

You can use both with steam.

Yeah you guys should join us, there's only around 6 people in chat at peak times. And that's a shame considering we hand out cookies at regular intervals.

Airbornem4 said:
You can use both with steam.

Yeah you guys should join us, there's only around 6 people in chat at peak times. And that's a shame considering we hand out cookies at regular intervals.

Lots of cookies!

Edited March 5, 2020 by Hydrazine_Soup

Ariel Sharon

Look for the picture of this guy:
If you find us, join the chatroom and say hi, there's usually one of us admin'ing so can invite you to the group, once we work out who you are

My username is Mister Kingdom, same as the forum. In fact, here's my user page. I hope I meet your standards, my friends. You'll probably see me quite often, I've only got two games, and only one of 'em is on Steam.

(T'other' s Minecraft.)

This is why you should join. I grabbed this during the accident. We had fun, unlike cookies aboard.

It was a blast.

lajoswinkler said:
This is why you should join. I grabbed this during the accident. We had fun, unlike cookies aboard.

http://s7.postimg.org/oxup5vd63/Image1.png

It was a blast.

Wow

Edited March 5, 2020 by Hydrazine_Soup

G'day Guys, fairly New to KSP Here, but would love to join the group and chat with some fellow Kerbals.

There is a Link to my Steam Profile, figured that would be the easiest way.

Thank you very much.

G'day Guys, fairly New to KSP Here, but would love to join the group and chat with some fellow Kerbals.

http://steamsignature.com/profile/english/76561198068204572.png There is a Link to my Steam Profile, figured that would be the easiest way.

Thank you very much.

Hello there,

long time no sea, or however that saying was called. To be honest, I don't really even know the meaning. I just wanted to say that I haven't been here for a while. Nevermind.

I sent you a friend invite, when you accepted me, just send me a message so I can add you to the group. Otherwise you run a good risk of me forgetting to do it

See you then.
Or just come find us and join the chat - there' usually a couple of admins about to get you joined up
I believe anyone who is in the group can invite someone to join. I haven't had any problems inviting people and i'm not an admin or mod.

bumpity-bump-bump, as the sales have attracted new players and members to the forum!

and I'm off work recovering from a minor operation, I'm about a lot more over the next week or two...
(daft punk) but if you find morepower you might find me if not done yet

#ExistencialQuestionsThatOnlyOccurOnKspForumChat

http://i.imgur.com/e0OjLvg.png

I wonder, do they fly on the left?

I wonder, do they fly on the left?

everyone does - it's called "flying left seat" for a reason... that's where the pilot is!

Hello there!

I'm back to KSP, the group, and a bit in the Forum, too, so any requests for joining the group can be sent to me without having to wait several months again.

If you don't want to go to the first page: My Steam name is - as you might guess - Volcanix, and I have the same avatar as here. I will accept you, after I done that just send me a message asking me to add you to the group. I wish you all happy holidays and a merry christmas, by the way!

See you
I'm One-Way Gaming. I hope I don't confuse anyone though with my insanely different names on KSP Forums and Steam

Well, my original name on Steam was [CENSORED: RULE 2.2c], but I later changed it to [CENSORED: RULE 2.2c], and most recently changed it to Slam Jones so that I can actually post it places without folks getting, like, super offended >.>

Edit: To clarify, I can't actually post those two names because, you guessed it, forum rule 2.2c (specifically the drugs part of it)
Sent a group invite to you slam, like to see you in the chat sometime
Gordon Frohman. There's a lot of them, mine has the Dwarf Fortress dwarf as an avatar.
I'm "Teslamax". Surprise!

I'm One-Way Gaming. I hope I don't confuse anyone though with my insanely different names on KSP Forums and Steam

I added you, make sure to send me a message so I add you to the group.

Gordon Frohman. There's a lot of them, mine has the Dwarf Fortress dwarf as an avatar.

Uhm.. I can't find you, maybe it's because I don't know what a Dwarf Fortress dwarf looks like. Can you send me an invite? -> Volcanix is my Steam name, as you might guess.

I'm "Teslamax". Surprise!

You seem to already be in the group. Someone was faster than me <.< Welcome!
